Across Africa, there are over 1,200 existing dams, with 600 more proposed or under construction. However, 90% of Environmental Impact Assessments completely ignore the impacts of dams have on schistosomiasis and other water-borne diseases. 
:::

### Existing and planned dams by country  
Existing and planned dams in Africa by country as of 2019. Existing dam data is taken from the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) database. Planned dam data is taken from the Global Dam Watch Future Hydropower Reservoirs and Dams database.  


:::
:::
:::

::: {.content-container}
Without proper risk assessment, these infrastructure projects inadvertently create perfect breeding grounds for disease-carrying snails which results in new transmission hotspots that trap entire communities in cycles of poverty and disease.
:::
